plot: Yuki joins his school's Newspaper Club and is put in charge of the advice column. Part of his task is to mediate between the 3 girls that are the staff of the advice column, who are often at odds, and choose the best answer to the questions.
opening_theme: "Outotsu Kaiketsu Sensation" by Ayame and Yurika
ending_theme: "Jinsei Kimi-Iro" (人生☆キミ色) by Hiyori Nitta, Moe Toyota, & Ayaka Suwa
insert_song: "Koganen no Uta" (コガネンのうた) by Daisuke Namikawa
